summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Discord Bot Dashboard - Iteration 7. All 23 backend API tests passed (100% success rate). Frontend UI fully functional with all new features working correctly including Edit dialogs for Reaction Roles, Tickets, Temp Channels, and Games page with 12 games and category filter.
passed_tests: API: POST /api/auth/login - 200 OK (admin@test.de / admin123)
API: POST /api/auth/login with invalid credentials - 401 Unauthorized
API: GET /api/guilds/{guildId}/reaction-roles - 200 OK
API: POST /api/guilds/{guildId}/reaction-roles - 200 OK (creates with roles array)
API: PUT /api/guilds/{guildId}/reaction-roles/{rr_id} - 200 OK (updates title, description, color)
API: DELETE /api/guilds/{guildId}/reaction-roles/{rr_id} - 200 OK
API: DELETE /api/guilds/{guildId}/reaction-roles/nonexistent - 404 Not Found
API: GET /api/guilds/{guildId}/ticket-panels - 200 OK
API: POST /api/guilds/{guildId}/ticket-panels - 200 OK (creates with categories, custom_fields)
API: PUT /api/guilds/{guildId}/ticket-panels/{panel_id} - 200 OK
API: DELETE /api/guilds/{guildId}/ticket-panels/{panel_id} - 200 OK
API: DELETE /api/guilds/{guildId}/ticket-panels/nonexistent - 404 Not Found
API: GET /api/guilds/{guildId}/temp-creators - 200 OK
API: POST /api/guilds/{guildId}/temp-creators - 200 OK (creates with all options)
API: PUT /api/guilds/{guildId}/temp-creators/{creator_id} - 200 OK
API: DELETE /api/guilds/{guildId}/temp-creators/{creator_id} - 200 OK
API: DELETE /api/guilds/{guildId}/temp-creators/nonexistent - 404 Not Found
API: GET /api/guilds/{guildId} - 200 OK
API: PUT /api/guilds/{guildId} with disabled_games array - 200 OK
API: PUT /api/guilds/{guildId} with games_enabled toggle - 200 OK
Frontend: Login page loads with E-Mail and Passwort fields
Frontend: Login with admin@test.de / admin123 successful
Frontend: Dashboard loads with sidebar navigation
Frontend: All navigation items visible (Dashboard, Moderation, Berechtigungen, Temp Kanäle, Reaction Roles, Spiele, Tickets, Leveling, Willkommen, Commands, KI Chat, News, Einstellungen, Benutzer)
Frontend: Reaction Roles page loads with 'Neue Reaction Role' button
Frontend: Reaction Roles page shows Button and Emoji info cards
Frontend: Reaction Roles page shows Active Reaction Roles with Edit buttons
Frontend: Reaction Roles Edit dialog opens with all fields (Typ, Kanal, Titel, Embed Farbe, Beschreibung, Bild URL, Thumbnail URL)
Frontend: Reaction Roles Edit dialog shows live preview (VORSCHAU)
Frontend: Reaction Roles Edit dialog has Rollen section with 'Rolle hinzufügen' button
Frontend: Tickets page loads with 'Neues Panel' button
Frontend: Tickets page shows stats cards (Offen, Beansprucht, Geschlossen, Gesamt)
Frontend: Tickets page shows Ticket-Panels section
Frontend: Tickets page shows Letzte Tickets section
Frontend: Tickets page shows Discord Befehle section
Frontend: Temp Kanäle page loads with 'Neuer Creator' button
Frontend: Temp Kanäle page shows Temp Voice Creators section
Frontend: Temp Kanäle page shows Aktive Temp-Channels section
Frontend: Temp Kanäle page shows Discord Befehle section
Frontend: Games page loads with 'Discord Spiele' title
Frontend: Games page shows '12 Spiele verfügbar • 12 aktiviert'
Frontend: Games page has Global Settings with 'Spiele aktivieren' toggle
Frontend: Games page has Spiele-Kanal selector
Frontend: Games page has Cooldown slider (30s)
Frontend: Games page has 'Alle aktivieren' and 'Alle deaktivieren' buttons
Frontend: Games page shows stats cards (Gespielt, Aktiviert, Aktiv, Top Spieler)
Frontend: Games page has all 6 category filter buttons (Alle Spiele, Klassiker, Wissen, Zufall, Geschicklichkeit, Spaß)
Frontend: Games page shows all 12 games with individual toggle switches
Frontend: Games - Tic Tac Toe (2 Spieler) with toggle
Frontend: Games - Stadt Land Fluss (2-4 Spieler) with toggle
Frontend: Games - Münzwurf (1 Spieler) with toggle
Frontend: Games - Würfeln (1 Spieler) with toggle

Frontend: Games - Magische 8-Ball (1 Spieler) with toggle
Frontend: Games - Galgenmännchen (1+ Spieler) with toggle

Frontend: Games - Wortkette (2+ Spieler) with toggle
Frontend: Games - Reaktionstest (1+ Spieler) with toggle
Frontend: Games - Memory (1-2 Spieler) with toggle
Frontend: Games category filter 'Wissen' correctly shows only 4 games (Stadt Land Fluss, Galgenmännchen, Quiz/Trivia, Wortkette)
Frontend: Games toggle switch works - disabling a game updates counter to 11/12
Frontend: Games toggle switch visually grays out disabled games
critical_code_review_comments: All API endpoints properly implemented with correct CRUD operations
PUT endpoint for reaction-roles working correctly
disabled_games array now properly supported in GuildConfigUpdate model (fixed during testing)
game_cooldown and max_active_games fields added to GuildConfigUpdate model
Frontend Edit dialogs have all required fields with proper validation
Games page correctly implements 12 games with individual toggles
Category filter correctly filters games by category
Live preview in Reaction Roles edit dialog working correctly
UI design is consistent with Discord-style dark theme
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up TEST_ prefixed reaction roles, ticket panels, and temp creators during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All APIs working: /api/auth/login, /api/guilds/{guildId}/reaction-roles (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE), /api/guilds/{guildId}/ticket-panels (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE), /api/guilds/{guildId}/temp-creators (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE), /api/guilds/{guildId} (GET, PUT with disabled_games array). Frontend fully functional with Edit dialogs for Reaction Roles, Tickets, Temp Channels. Games page has 12 games (TicTacToe, Stadt Land Fluss, Münzwurf, Würfeln, RPS, 8-Ball, Hangman, Trivia, Zahlenraten, Wortkette, Reaktionstest, Memory) with individual toggles and 6 category filters (Alle, Klassiker, Wissen, Zufall, Geschicklichkeit, Spaß). Test credentials: admin@test.de / admin123, Guild ID: 807292920734547969.
